shapes

Class GraphicElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.GraphicElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PointBasedElement, RadialElement, RectangularElement, TextElement

    public abstract class GraphicElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an object on the canvas. It defines the basic operations and attributes of a shape. Every shape should extend this class or one of its subclasses. This class holds attributes that are available to any shape: fillColor, strokeColor and strokeWidth
    See Also:
    Point, PointBasedElement, RadialElement, RectangularElement

        public abstract java.lang.String getJSON()

        Returns:
        A String containing a JSON representation of the GraphicElement

      • modify

        public abstract boolean modify(java.lang.String attributes)
        Should modify the GraphicElement using the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        attributes - A JSON String containing the attributes to be modified
        Returns:
        true if the shape had one or more of its attributes modified, false otherwise
